scripts.test:protocol: npm run test-mixed-encoding && npm run test-packet-encoding && npm run test-encoding-integration && npm run test-server-opcode-decoding
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:counter && npm run test:e2e:cookie
scripts.test:e2e:with-game: npm run test:e2e && npm run test:e2e:game
scripts.test:e2e:counter: tsx src/cli.ts script -u ws://localhost:8080/game/counter -l counter -s scenarios/counter/
scripts.test:e2e:cookie: tsx src/cli.ts script -u ws://localhost:8080/game/cookie -l cookie -s scenarios/cookie/
scripts.test:e2e:game: tsx src/cli.ts script -u ws://localhost:8080/game/hero-defense -l hero-defense -s scenarios/game/
scripts.test:e2e:all: npm run test:e2e:jsonObject && npm run test:e2e:opcodeJsonArray && npm run test:e2e:messagepack
scripts.test:e2e:jsonObject: TRANSPORT_ENCODING=json npm run test:e2e:counter -- --state-update-encoding jsonObject && TRANSPORT_ENCODING=json npm run test:e2e:cookie -- --state-update-encoding jsonObject && TRANSPORT_ENCODING=json npm run test:e2e:reevaluation -- --state-update-encoding jsonObject
scripts.test:e2e:opcodeJsonArray: TRANSPORT_ENCODING=jsonOpcode npm run test:e2e:counter -- --state-update-encoding opcodeJsonArray && TRANSPORT_ENCODING=jsonOpcode npm run test:e2e:cookie -- --state-update-encoding opcodeJsonArray && TRANSPORT_ENCODING=jsonOpcode npm run test:e2e:reevaluation -- --state-update-encoding opcodeJsonArray
scripts.test:e2e:messagepack: TRANSPORT_ENCODING=messagepack npm run test:e2e:counter -- --state-update-encoding messagepack && TRANSPORT_ENCODING=messagepack npm run test:e2e:cookie -- --state-update-encoding messagepack && TRANSPORT_ENCODING=messagepack npm run test:e2e:reevaluation -- --state-update-encoding messagepack
scripts.test: npm run test:protocol && npm run test:e2e:all
